 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָרַח‎</span> **verb** ==go free, be unrestrained, overrun, exceed== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָרוּחַ‎</span> ***overhanging, flapping***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> of camels, etc., ***pasture where they please***; also ***send forth*** to pasture; II. ***let*** a wife ***go free; let down*** the hair; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***easy***. — Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָרַח‎</span>, Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> usually = ***corrupt, sin***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּסְרַח‎</span> [[Exod.26.12|Exod 26:12]] ***Participle active*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֹרַ֫חַת‎</span> [[Ezek.17.6|Ezek 17:6]] ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָרוּחַ‎</span> (compare [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1, 137</sup> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:50»§ 50</sup> f. [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>NB 180</sup>) [[Exod.26.13|Exod 26:13]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְרוּחִים‎</span> [[Amos.6.7|Amos 6:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְרֻחִים‎</span> v[[Amos.6.4|Amos 6:4]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְרוּחֵי‎</span> [[Ezek.23.15|Ezek 23:15]] — 

**1.** ***go free, be unrestrained:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּסְרֻחִים עַלעַֿרְשׂוֺתָם‎</span> [[Amos.6.4|Amos 6:4]] i.e. probably = ***and are sprawling*** upon their couches (in contemptuous hyperbole), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִרַזְח ס‎</span> v[[Amos.6.7|Amos 6:7]] ***the revelry of sprawlers***; participle active of ***overrunning, spreading*** vine [[Ezek.17.6|Ezek 17:6]]. 

**2.** of ***overhanging*** stuffs (properly ***overrunning, exceeding, extended beyond limits***) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּסְרַח עַל אֲחֹרֵי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמִּשְׁכָּן‎</span> [[Exod.26.12|Exod 26:12]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) ***it shall overrun*** (***overhang***), over the back of the tabernacle, so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִהְיֶה סָרוּחַ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלצִֿדֵּי הַמּ‎</span> v[[Exod.26.13|Exod 26:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְרוּחֵי טְבוּלִים‎</span> [[Ezek.23.15|Ezek 23:15]] ***overhungof turbans***, extended with respect to turbans, = with pendant turbans (compare [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טְבוּל‎</span>]). **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְרְחָה חָכְמָתָם‎</span> [[Jer.49.7|Jer 49:7]] usually ***is their wisdom let loose*** (i.e. ***dismissed, gone***)? (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַאֵין עוֺד‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָכְמָה בְּתֵימָ֑ן אָֽבְד עֵצָה מִבַּנִים‎</span>); but [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>Expos. May, 1897, 363</sup> ***is corrupt*** (compare Late Hebrew, and especially Aramaic).
